trans-unit.source: Discovers attributed parts from a collection of types.
This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
This class is thread safe.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> class with the specified types.
A collection of attributed <xref href="System.Type"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> object.
types is `null`.
types contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
types contains an element that was loaded in the reflection-only context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> class with the specified types.
An array of attributed <xref href="System.Type"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> object.
types is `null`.
types contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
types contains an element that was loaded in the reflection-only context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> class with the specified types and source for parts.
A collection of attributed <xref href="System.Type"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> object.
An element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
types is `null`.
types contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
types contains an element that was loaded in the reflection-only context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> class with the specified types in the specified reflection context.
A collection of attributed <xref href="System.Type"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> object.
The context used to interpret the types.
types is `null`.
types contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
types contains an element that was loaded in the reflection-only context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> class with the specified types in the specified reflection context and source for parts.
A collection of attributed <xref href="System.Type"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> object.
The context used to interpret the types.
An element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
types is `null`.
types contains an element that is `null`.
-or-
types contains an element that was loaded in the reflection-only context.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
Returns a string representation of the type catalog.
A string representation of the type catalog.
Gets the display name of the type catalog.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
A string containing a human-readable display name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog"></xref>.
Gets the composition element from which the type catalog originated.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.TypeCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
Always `null`.
